page.title: 04Green Moor village
page.content: Green Moor is quite a small village.It hasn't got any shops and we think it should have at least 3 shops.1 co-op, 1 cafe, 1 butchers shop and we think it should have a fish and chip shop. There is one pub called The Rock Inn. You can get meals from there and chocolate and crisps. Outside, there are tables and chairs you can sit at, and outside the pub there is a pump house and some old stocks. There are no churches only one chapel. There is a Sunday school which a lot of people go to.There are concerts every year which the Sunday school are in . There is only a van comes round and you can get food from it . There is a small museum containing old objects such as mangles,gas masks and old coins.
